input_text:
Job Title: Product Owner (Remote)

Location: Jackson, MS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Job Description

Job Description

Title: Integration Manager

Location: Remote

Job Summary:

Reporting to the Product Marketing leadership, this role will support North America Marketing projects related to merging key legacy brands to the future state product offerings, including impacted IT and system changes, as well as process solutions.

Manages approved category strategy plans with the cross functional team for implementation and serves as the end-to-end cross-functional lead of integration efforts for all Pest Control lines of business, focused on operations that support Price, Promotion or Marketing. Partners with Managers, Sr. Product Managers, and Project Management to implement the strategy, apply product expertise, ensure execution excellence through code testing and managing feedback from migrated branches.

Key Performance Indicators:

 Delivery: Execution of strategy by Line of Business for Pest Control categories Efficiency: Meeting deadlines for integration with accuracy and high attention to detail Growth: Support migrations, acting as the subject matter expert on integration processes and specifics Customer retention: We will measure success through customer satisfaction and retention throughout the migration process.

Principal Duties and Responsibilities:

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.

Responsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the following:

 Takes ownership of integration projects and tasks for Product Marketing including code and pricing setup, UAT testing, and communications with Sales Entry, Change Management, and Training teams on upcoming changes by region. Leads branch and region support for Pest Control integration activities. As each region starts integration, this role will serve as the Product and Pricing expert on codes and processes and will work to resolve any issues or concerns. Coordinates with other team members within Product Marketing, Pricing,Technical, Sales, and Sales Entry to confirm execution. Supports Project Management with relevant updates and tracking of progress to ensure we meet all deadlines and deliverables with high accuracy of input. Develops and maintains strong relationships with key stakeholders, including regular communication.

Required Experience:

 Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Marketing or related area. 3-5 years experience in product management or related Marketing functions. Strong leadership, influencing, and presentation skills are required. Strong knowledge of product go to market strategies, including pricing, promotion, place and proposition development. Strong understanding of consumer market research and how to apply it to strategy. Superior data analytics capability. Statistical understanding is a plus. Must possess superior verbal and written communication skills. Business acumen - Ability to provide leadership and direction at a cross functional leadership level. Focus on consumer needs, market conditions and competitive environment. Excellent organizational skills with a heightened sense of attention to detail are key characteristics of the perfect candidate. Strong interpersonal skills that allow for healthy internal and external relationships are a must. Additionally, strong computer skills whereby the candidate is fluent in Excel. Google Platform experience is a plus. Experience in a consumer-focused, branded product or services business required Required Leadership Traits and Characteristics. Strong executive presence and ability to influence and engage with senior leadership. Outstanding analytical and problem-solving abilities with a strong understanding of corporate marketing and influencing decisions. Able to demonstrate high levels of drive, work ethic and personal accountability with the ability to work under pressure while maintaining sound judgement and a rigorous focus on the details.

Formal Education, Qualifications or Training:

 Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in an Economics, Marketing, or related subject

Physical Demands and Working Conditions:

The physical demands are representative of those that must be met by an employee to perform the essential function to this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Incumbent must be prepared to:

 Sitting for long periods of time while using office equipment such as computers, phones and etc. Fingering and Repetitive motions; such as movement of wrists, hands and fingers while picking, pinching and typing during your normal working environment. Express or exchange ideas with others through the use of spoken word, quickly, accurately, and at an easily audible volume, and receive detailed information through oral communication at usual speaking levels without correction, and/or make fine discriminations in the nature of sounds in the environment.

Incumbent is required to have:

 Close visual acuity to perform detail-oriented activities at distances close to the eyes, as well as visual acuity to perform activities at or within arm’s reach with skill, control, and accuracy, such as preparing and analyzing data, viewing computer screen and expansive reading.

Company Description

At Cogent, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of our expertise to set new industry standards. Through continuous refinement of our processes and broadening our services to meet evolving needs across industries, we provide effective, future-forward and comprehensive solutions.

Company Description

At Cogent, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of our expertise to set new industry standards. Through continuous refinement of our processes and broadening our services to meet evolving needs across industries, we provide effective, future-forward and comprehensive solutions.

Experience Level (if available): Director

Branch and region support for Pest Control integration activities
